remarks: The set of closed walks (in an undirected graph) of a fixed length as words over the set of vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Mar-2018.)
statement:
clwwlkn $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) = { w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) | ( # ` w ) = N } ) $.
$d E w $.
$d N w $.
$d V w $.
